Counsel to a Quick-tempered Teacher.--Every teacher has his own peculiar trait of character to watch lest Satan should use him as his agent to destroy souls 

192 

by his own unconsecrated traits of character. The only safety for teachers is to learn daily in the school of Christ, His meekness, His lowliness of heart; then self will be hid in Christ, and he will meekly wear the yoke of Christ and consider he is dealing with His heritage.
